BG.name: Planet Crashers
BG.description: As one of the youngest and brightest cadets to graduate from the esteemed Planet Crashers Academy, your first assignment couldn’t be much bigger. An intern from the Academy, Jinkle-bottom, has been sent to deliver your orders: “Reports indicate an unknown evil has emerged from the darkest corner of the galaxy, with plans to snuff out the sun. The Academy is putting you on the case. Journey to the other side of the galaxy, and prevent the unimaginable from happening.” Are you ready to take on the adventure of a lifetime? - Fully explore a massive universe filled with danger and adventure - Battle in dungeons to gain experience points, level-up weapons, and advance to nearby planets - Fully customisable main character means that no two heroes are the same - Experience an epic 3D Adventure/RPG that brings a universe of thrills and excitement to your Nintendo 3DS!

AU.name: Planet Crashers

BE.name: Planet Crashers
BE.description: Vous êtes l'un des plus jeunes élèves officiers diplômés de la prestigieuse Planet Crashers Academy... et l'un des plus prometteurs ! Jinkle-bottom, un stagiaire de l'Academy, est dépêché sur place pour vous transmettre les ordres d'une première mission particulièrement dangereuse : « Un Mal d'origine inconnue a surgi des entrailles de l'univers. D'après les premiers rapports, cette entité démoniaque est farouchement déterminée à dévorer le soleil. L'Academy vous charge de vous aventurer au plus profond de la galaxie, et de faire le nécessaire pour éviter l'impensable. » Êtes-vous prêt à embarquer pour un périple inoubliable ? - Parcourez de long en large un univers gigantissime truffé de dangers et regorgeant de péripéties. - Battez-vous pour gagner des points d'expérience, faites évoluer vos armes et explorez les planètes avoisinantes. - Votre alter ego virtuel est intégralement personnalisable : chaque héros est unique ! - Plongez au cœur d'une épopée 3D, teintée de RPG, qui confère une nouvelle dimension épique à votre Nintendo 3DS !

DE.name: Planet Crashers
DE.description: Du bist einer der jüngsten und besten Kadetten, der je von der angesehenen Planet Crashers-Akademie abgegangen sind, und dein erster Auftrag könnte kaum größer sein. Ein Mitarbeiter der Akademie namens Jinkle-bottom bringt dir deine Befehle: „Berichten zufolge ist ein unbekanntes Übel aus der dunkelsten Ecke der Galaxie aufgetaucht, das die Sonne auslöschen will. Die Akademie setzt dich darauf an. Reise auf die andere Seite der Galaxie und verhindere, dass das Unvorstellbare eintritt.” Bist du bereit, das Abenteuer deines Lebens zu beginnen? - Erkunde ein riesiges Universum voller Gefahren und Abenteuer - Kämpfe in Dungeons, um Erfahrungspunkte, bessere Waffen und Wege zu Planeten in der Nähe zu erhalten - Komplett anpassungsfähiger Hauptcharakter, sodass sich keine zwei Helden gleichen - Erlebe ein episches 3D-Abenteuer-Rollenspiel, das ein Universum voller Spannung und Action auf deinem Nintendo 3DS entstehen lässt!

RU.name: Planet Crashers
RU.description: Вы — самый молодой и подающий надежды выпускник академии Planet Crashers, и от успеха вашего первого задания зависит мир во всей галактике! Из самых темных уголков Вселенной вырвалось древнее зло, и теперь оно желает похитить само Солнце! Отправляйтесь в дальнее путешествие к звездам и предотвратите катастрофу! Готовы ли вы взять на себя такую ответственность? - Исследуйте вселенную, полную неожиданностей и опасностей! - Сражайтесь в подземельях, чтобы получать ценный опыт, прокачивать оружие и перемещаться на новые планеты; - Создайте своего собственного героя; - Попробуйте новую ролевую игру космических масштабов на Nintendo 3DS!

HU.name: Planet Crashers
HU.description: As one of the youngest and brightest cadets to graduate from the esteemed Planet Crashers Academy, your first assignment couldn’t be much bigger. An intern from the Academy, Jinkle-bottom, has been sent to deliver your orders: “Reports indicate an unknown evil has emerged from the darkest corner of the galaxy, with plans to snuff out the sun. The Academy is putting you on the case. Journey to the other side of the galaxy, and prevent the unimaginable from happening.” Are you ready to take on the adventure of a lifetime? - Fully explore a massive universe filled with danger and adventure - Battle in dungeons to gain experience points, level-up weapons, and advance to nearby planets - Fully customisable main character means that no two heroes are the same - Experience an epic 3D Adventure/RPG that brings a universe of thrills and excitement to your Nintendo 3DS!

IT.name: Planet Crashers
IT.description: Nelle vesti del più giovane e brillante allievo dell'illustre Accademia di Planet Crashers, non potevi sognare una missione più importante. Uno stagista dell'Accademia, Jinkle-bottom, è venuto a comunicarti il tuo incarico: "I nostri rapporti indicano la presenza di un male sconosciuto proveniente da un angolo oscuro della galassia, il cui piano consiste nello spegnere il sole. L'Accademia ti chiede di raggiungere l'altro lato della galassia e di evitare che un evento così catastrofico possa verificarsi". Sei pronto a lanciarti nell'avventura della tua vita? - Esplora in piena libertà un immenso universo, pieno di pericoli e avventure - Combatti nei sotterranei per accumulare punti esperienza, potenziare le armi e accedere ai pianeti confinanti - Il personaggio principale è completamente personalizzabile: significa che non ci saranno due eroi uguali tra loro - Immergiti in questo epico RPG di avventura 3D, in grado di portare un universo di brividi ed emozioni sulla tua Nintendo 3DS!

ES.name: Planet Crashers
ES.description: Como uno de los cadetes más jóvenes y destacados que se han graduado en la prestigiosa Academia Planet Crashers, tu primera misión no podía ser más importante. La Academia ha enviado al pasante Jinkle-bottom con tus órdenes: “Los informes indican que ha surgido un mal desconocido del rincón más oscuro de la galaxia y planea apagar el sol. La Academia quiere que te encargues del caso. Viaja al otro lado de la galaxia y evita que suceda lo inimaginable.” ¿Estás listo para embarcarte en la aventura de tu vida? - Explora por completo un amplio universo lleno de peligros y aventuras. - Combate en mazmorras para obtener puntos de experiencia, mejorar las armas y avanzar a planetas cercanos. - Gracias a la personalización total del protagonista, no hay dos héroes iguales. - ¡Vive una épica aventura de rol en 3D que llevará un universo de emociones a tu Nintendo 3DS!

ZA.name: Planet Crashers
ZA.description: As one of the youngest and brightest cadets to graduate from the esteemed Planet Crashers Academy, your first assignment couldn’t be much bigger. An intern from the Academy, Jinkle-bottom, has been sent to deliver your orders: “Reports indicate an unknown evil has emerged from the darkest corner of the galaxy, with plans to snuff out the sun. The Academy is putting you on the case. Journey to the other side of the galaxy, and prevent the unimaginable from happening.” Are you ready to take on the adventure of a lifetime? - Fully explore a massive universe filled with danger and adventure - Battle in dungeons to gain experience points, level-up weapons, and advance to nearby planets - Fully customisable main character means that no two heroes are the same - Experience an epic 3D Adventure/RPG that brings a universe of thrills and excitement to your Nintendo 3DS!
